the anti straight sex madness of the Islamic-feminist NWO are haunting me everywhere, eve3n in porn sites, it now but me near the brink of madnessQuoting: the anti-feminsm anomaly....
when i found that when i stopped watching porn in the last moths/years did not got me out of hell(poverty) as i thought it would do, but instead it actually maybe even have put me in more hell
thus today i tried to search for some straight porn to watch, but i found most sites acting like an AI-controlled simulation that are desgined to make me either:
1-liberal(feminist who lack straight sexual desire/pleasure for being cuckold/gay, or are oppressing for being a slave to the feminist authorities/laws, so females can mingle/study/work/own-wealth like men), like westerners
2-religious(feminist who oppress his straight sexual desire/pleasure for being a slave to a god who call his sexual desire/pleasure a demonic lust/sin/illness/corruption, so females can mingle/study/work/own-wealth like men), like Muslims
i have searched online about a type of porn that is called "blasphemy porn" that was supposed show naked women tearing Quran
the first video that i have found -or that the NWO matrix made me found- was a video called "Beautiful Goddess Madam Brandon"
when i tried to watch it, it nearly driven me made, out of confusion and anger
the 12 minute long video nearly did not show any nudity, except few second at the end
and there was no tearing Quran either
it was just SOME crazy NWO BOT woman who call itself Madam Brandon
she was holding Quran in her hand and pretending that she are a Nazi(Arian) who are insulting Quran, but she never really insulted the Quran
she just kept looking at the camera while talking to the viewer of her video -me- by saying some NWO secular-looking, yet Islamic-feminist anti-sex bullshit, like:
1-how the watcher of her video -me- must be a Muslim and nothing else, just because "Quran is the holy book of his family" and because "he want his wife to wear niqab"
2-taunting the watcher by saying how the watcher of her video -me- are poor to such degree he is eating shit and keep begging his neighbors for food, while she, westerners like her and the neighbors that he beg, are so rich they make thire dogs eat meat
3-how the watcher of her video -me- are doing shameful betrayal to his Quran/god, by worshipping the west, by mastarbating (not sure how mastarbating are worshipping the west)
4-how all this happen to him only because he is less than a dog, because he can not control himself(refuse to oppress his sexual desire/expression/pleasure/jealousy, especially in public so females can be free to feminist by living/mingling/studying/working/owning-wealth like men, as how feminist waves like Islam and liberalism order men to do)
of course this has nothing to do with porn/sex or blasphemy/anti-Islam
the video was describing my exact condition(being an arab, belonging to a Muslim family, being conservative who want his wife to wear niqab, being too poor i had to beg my liberal/westernized dog-owning neighbors for food, was mastarbating while i was watching this video)
thus, this is nothing but an unexpected and powerful as hell and phycological-attack from my enemies, that was designed to target either only me, or me and several individuals who are like me, in order to:
1-convince me to stop the few free sexual-desire/pleasure/activities/expression(like watching porn/mastarbating), that my enemies still could not manage to prevent me from having(as how they prevented me from marrying, by making me poor/legally-oppressed and even from fantasying about marrying, by disturbing my fantasies with noises), in order to enforce queerness(asexuality or gayness) on me
by calling my sexual desire/pleasurer: "lack of self-control" and "shameful betrayal to my god/Quran"
2-justify the poverty that my enemies -her NWO- are enforcing on me by blaming it on me being bad(less than dog for lacking self-control)
3-convince me that i am a Muslims and/or that i can not be anything except either westerner(liberal/gay/cuckold/semi-asexual/capitalist/feminist/slave to authority/media) or Muslim(capitalist, semi-asexual/feminist and slave to Allah/religion)
what she said wasn't blasphemy against Islam or sexual
it is only the usual beliefs of my enemies who started to rule Egypt since 2013, that i call "the moderate(Islamic-liberal) NWO"
it is very confusing beliefs, but i think it is a mix of modern version of Islam and some limited but yet inhuman fascist version of feminsm/capitalism
it is desgined to
1-destroy people like me:"conservative people who are not religious", by making them poor/oppressed/dishonored/damaged/corrupted/imprisoned, or by converting to join the NWO, by converting them to be either liberal and/or Muslim
it is one of main crazy beliefs of the NWO world-religion that the identification of Muslims are only: {arabs, conservatives who want thire wives to wear/live conservatively and whom thire families are Muslims}, not: {people who worship Allah and control/oppress thire sexual desire/expression/pleasure as how Allah/Quran has ordered them}
you draft your shit before posting right? cos that read like retard on roids.
